antgame.ant.conditions

Interface Condition

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FoeCondition, FoeHomeCondition, FoeMarkerCondition, FoeWithFoodCondition, FoodCondition, FriendCondition, FriendWithFoodCondition, HomeCondition, MarkerCondition, RockCondition

    public interface Condition
    Author:
    ItsTheRai

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkCondition(TerrainToken token, Color color, Marker m) 

    • Method Detail

      • checkCondition

        boolean checkCondition(TerrainToken token,
                     Color color,
                     Marker m)
        Parameters:
        token - The WorldToken object whose condition is to be checked
        color - The color of the ant checking the condition
        m - A marker object that is to be sensed, null if not a sense operation
        Returns:
        returns true if the condition is met, false otherwise
